title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 34.5 - Display of license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 34.5 - Display of license

State Regulations

In a headquarters location and each satellite office, the establishing agent or broker must prominently display the license or licenses of the supervising person or persons responsible for that place of business. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
34.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
